NeuralNetwork.Layers.ActivationFunctions.HyperbolicTangentActivationFunction

NeuralNetwork.Layers.ActivationFunctions.HyperbolicTangentActivationFunction Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A hyperbolic tangent activation function of a neuron. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hyperbolic_tangent for further details.
